Package de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.utils

Helper functions and classes for Unfolding.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DebugDisplay Displays various information about the map.
GeneralizationUtils Provides utility functions to simplify points, paths, and polygons.
GeoUtils Basic geo-spatial utility methods.
LargeMapImageUtils Utility class to save large map images.
MapPosition Class used to store positions on a specific map.
MapUtils Utility and convenience methods for simplifying map usage.
ScreenPosition A ScreenPosition just a position on the screen.
StyleConstants Visual styles for UnfoldingMap's default simple markers.
 

Package de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.utils Description

Helper functions and classes for Unfolding.
